    Function reference

    All functions

    addDuToitCounts()
    Add DuToit's Pan data from Doug
    addExtraSitesToSummary()
    Add raw counts to CWAC SSM predictions
    addSiteVarEETimeLimit()
    Annotate site data with Google Earth Engine with a time limit
    addSpOccDetCovt()
    Add detection covariate to spOccupancy data list
    barberspan
    Barberspan CWAC data
    combineAbuDiags()
    Combine species abundance diagnostics into a single object
    combineOccuDiags()
    Combine species occupancy diagnostics into a single object
    configPipeline()
    Configure pipeline parameters
    createCombinedExportFile()
    Create a combined file for export to data mart
    createLog()
    Create pipeline event log
    createOccuData()
    Create data for fitting an occupancy model
    createPredFromAbap()
    Create prediction object directly from ABAP data
    diagnoseGofJagsSsm()
    Diagnose goodness-of-fit for JAGS state-space model
    diagnoseGofSpOccu()
    Conduct goodness-of-fit test for spOccupancy models
    diagnoseRhatJagsSsm()
    Diagnose convergence for JAGS state-space model
    diagnoseRhatSpOccu()
    Diagnose convergence for spOccupancy model
    fitSpOccu()
    Fit spOccupancy model
    gatherYearFromVars()
    Gather years from variables with year
    logFitStatus()
    Generate fit status messages
    pipe_prll_fit()
    Fit occupancy models in parallel
    plotDetections()
    Plot detection from occupancy data
    plotJagsSsm2ss()
    Plot state series of a JAGS state-space model with two seasons
    plotOccuVars()
    Plot occupancy covariates
    postPredDistJagsSsm()
    Prepare posterior predictive distribution for JAGS state-space model
    ppl_create_data_ssm()
    Prepare covariate data for abundance pipeline
    ppl_create_indtr_file()
    Create indicator storage files
    ppl_create_site_visit()
    Create site and visit occupancy files
    ppl_diagnose_occu()
    Run diagnostics for occupancy model fit
    ppl_diagnose_ssm()
    Run diagnostics for a state-space model fit
    ppl_fit_occu_model()
    Fit occupancy model
    ppl_fit_ssm_model()
    Fit state-space JAGS model
    ppl_run_pipe_abu1()
    Run abundance pipeline ABU1
    ppl_run_pipe_dst1()
    Run distribution indicators pipeline module 1
    ppl_summarise_occu()
    Summarise predictions from occupancy model
    ppl_summarise_ssm()
    Summarise predictions from state-space JAGS model
    predictSpOccu()
    Predict from spOccupancy model fit
    prepGEECatchmData()
    Prepare Google Earth Engine data for catchments
    prepGEESiteData()
    Prepare Google Earth Engine site data
    prepGEEVisitData()
    Prepare Google Earth Engine visit data
    prepSpOccuData_multi()
    Prepare spOccupancy data for multi-season model fitting
    prepSpOccuData_single()
    Prepare spOccupancy data for single-season model fitting
    prepSsmData()
    Prepare CWAC data to fit a state-space model
    processJAGSoutput()
    Process JAGS model outputs
    scaleSpOccVars()
    Scale covariates in spOccupancy-type data
    selectSppFromDiag()
    Select species based on model diagnostics
    setSpOutFilePath()
    Set a standard path for a pipeline output file associated with a species
    simDetSpOccu()
    Simulate detections from spOccupancy fit
    summariseSpOccu()
    Summarise spOccupancy occupancy estimates
    summaryJags()
    Summarise JAGS model fit
    waterbirds
    BIRDIE's waterbird masterlist
